item.title: Terence McKenna: The Poet-Philosopher Who Shaped the Psychedelic Renaissance
item.description: Explore the life and cultural impact of Terence McKenna, the renowned ethnobotanist, philosopher, and psychedelic pioneer whose ideas and advocacy helped shape the modern psychedelic renaissance and influenced generations of thinkers, artists, and seekers of expanded consciousness.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Timothy Leary: The Psychedelic Pioneer Who Expanded Consciousness
item.description: Explore the life and legacy of Timothy Leary, the controversial psychologist and countercultural icon who advocated for the therapeutic and transformative potential of psychedelic drugs
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
